Module algorithmsPortfolio
Package algorithmsPortfolio

Class MatchingGraph

java.lang.Object
algorithmsPortfolio.MatchingGraph
public class MatchingGraph
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MatchingGraph​(int totalNumVertices)
    creates a MatchingGraph object with totalNumVertices/2 Trainers and totalNumVertices/2 Pokemon

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addEdge​(int u, int v, int weight)
    if u is a trainer, then v is a pokemon, and weight is u's ranking of v if u is a pokemon, then v is a trainer, and weight is u's ranking of v In the first case, adds the pokemon to the trainer's preferenceList with the given ranking In the second case, adds the trainer to the pokemon's preferenceList with the given ranking
    Edge[] galeShapley()
    Finds stable matching with the Gale-Shapely algorithm Referenced Kleinberg & Tardos, Ch 1.1.
    int pokeToIndex​(int pokemonNum)  
    void writeStableEdgesToFile​(java.lang.String filename)
    writes the edges of the stable matching produced by the Gale-Shapley algorithm to the given file in the format of a Mathematica list of lists ex.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MatchingGraph

      public MatchingGraph​(int totalNumVertices)
      creates a MatchingGraph object with totalNumVertices/2 Trainers and totalNumVertices/2 Pokemon
      Parameters:
      totalNumVertices - in the graph

  • Method Details

    • pokeToIndex

      public int pokeToIndex​(int pokemonNum)
      Parameters:
      pokemonNum - - Pokemon number from original graph
      Returns:
      Index for that pokemon in the pokemon array

    • addEdge

      public void addEdge​(int u, int v, int weight)
      if u is a trainer, then v is a pokemon, and weight is u's ranking of v if u is a pokemon, then v is a trainer, and weight is u's ranking of v In the first case, adds the pokemon to the trainer's preferenceList with the given ranking In the second case, adds the trainer to the pokemon's preferenceList with the given ranking
      Parameters:
      u - first vertex
      v - second vertex
      weight - of edge

    • galeShapley

      public Edge[] galeShapley()
      Finds stable matching with the Gale-Shapely algorithm Referenced Kleinberg & Tardos, Ch 1.1. A first problem: Stable Matching reading as well as this video: https://youtu.be/fudb8DuzQlM
      Returns:
      Array of edges signifying matched pairs which create a stable matching

    • writeStableEdgesToFile

      public void writeStableEdgesToFile​(java.lang.String filename)
      writes the edges of the stable matching produced by the Gale-Shapley algorithm to the given file in the format of a Mathematica list of lists ex. {{1,3},{2,4}}
      Parameters:
      filename - to which to write the stable edges assumes galeShapley has already been called
